addShortLiquidityWithETH(address,uint256.details: Adds redeemToken liquidity to a redeem<>underlyingToken pair by minting shortOptionTokens with underlyingTokens.

params.amountBMax: The quantity of underlyingTokens to add with shortOptionTokens to the Uniswap V2 Pair.
params.amountBMin: The minimum quantity of underlyingTokens expected to provide liquidity with.
params.deadline: The timestamp to expire a pending transaction.
params.optionAddress: The address of the optionToken to get the redeemToken to mint then provide liquidity for.
params.quantityOptions: The quantity of underlyingTokens to use to mint option + redeem tokens.
params.to: The address that receives UNI-V2 shares.

addShortLiquidityWithUnderlying(address,.details: Adds redeemToken liquidity to a redeem<>underlyingToken pair by minting redeemTokens with underlyingTokens.

params.amountBMax: The quantity of underlyingTokens to add with redeemTokens to the Uniswap V2 Pair.
params.amountBMin: The minimum quantity of underlyingTokens expected to provide liquidity with.
params.deadline: The timestamp to expire a pending transaction.
params.optionAddress: The address of the optionToken to get the redeemToken to mint then provide liquidity for.
params.quantityOptions: The quantity of underlyingTokens to use to mint option + redeem tokens.
params.to: The address that receives UNI-V2 shares.

addShortLiquidityWithUnderlyingWithPermi.details: Adds redeemToken liquidity to a redeem<>underlyingToken pair by minting shortOptionTokens with underlyingTokens.

params.amountBMax: The quantity of underlyingTokens to add with shortOptionTokens to the Uniswap V2 Pair.
params.amountBMin: The minimum quantity of underlyingTokens expected to provide liquidity with.
params.deadline: The timestamp to expire a pending transaction.
params.optionAddress: The address of the optionToken to get the redeemToken to mint then provide liquidity for.
params.quantityOptions: The quantity of underlyingTokens to use to mint option + redeem tokens.
params.to: The address that receives UNI-V2 shares.

checkApproval(address,address).details: This contract does not hold funds, infinite approvals cannot be exploited for profit.

params.spender: The address to allow to spend `token`.
params.token: The token to approve spending for.

params.option: The option token to get the corresponding UniswapV2Pair market.

returns._0: The pair address, as well as the tokens of the pair.

removeShortLiquidityThenCloseOptions(add.details: Combines Uniswap V2 Router "removeLiquidity" function with Primitive "closeOptions" function.

params.amountAMin: The minimum quantity of shortOptionTokens to receive from removing liquidity.
params.amountBMin: The minimum quantity of underlyingTokens to receive from removing liquidity.
params.deadline: The timestamp to expire a pending transaction.
params.liquidity: The quantity of liquidity tokens to pull from _msgSender() and burn.
params.optionAddress: The address of the option that will be closed from burned UNI-V2 liquidity shares.
params.to: The address that receives underlyingTokens from burned UNI-V2, and underlyingTokens from closed options.

removeShortLiquidityThenCloseOptionsWith.details: Uses permit to pull LP tokens.

params.amountAMin: The minimum quantity of shortOptionTokens to receive from removing liquidity.
params.amountBMin: The minimum quantity of underlyingTokens to receive from removing liquidity.
params.deadline: The timestamp to expire a pending transaction and `permit` call.
params.liquidity: The quantity of liquidity tokens to pull from _msgSender() and burn.
params.optionAddress: The address of the option that will be closed from burned UNI-V2 liquidity shares.
params.to: The address that receives underlyingTokens from burned UNI-V2, and underlyingTokens from closed options.

addShortLiquidityWithETH(address,uint256.notice: Pulls underlying tokens from _msgSender() and pushes UNI-V2 liquidity tokens to the "getCaller()" address.         underlyingToken -> redeemToken -> UNI-V2.

addShortLiquidityWithUnderlying(address,.notice: Pulls underlying tokens from _msgSender() and pushes UNI-V2 liquidity tokens to the "getCaller()" address.         underlyingToken -> redeemToken -> UNI-V2.

addShortLiquidityWithUnderlyingWithDaiPe.notice: Specialized function for `permit` calling on Put options (DAI).

addShortLiquidityWithUnderlyingWithPermi.notice: Pulls underlying tokens from _msgSender() and pushes UNI-V2 liquidity tokens to the "getCaller()" address.         underlyingToken -> redeemToken -> UNI-V2. Uses permit so user does not need to `approve()` our contracts.

checkApproval(address,address).notice: Approves the `spender` to pull `token` from this contract.

getCaller().notice: Returns the state variable `_CALLER` in the Primitive Router.

getOptionPair(address).notice: Fetchs the Uniswap Pair for an option's redeemToken and underlyingToken params.

getPrimitiveRouter().notice: Returns the Primitive Router contract address.

isApproved(address,address).notice: Returns whether or not `spender` is approved to spend `token`, from this contract.

removeShortLiquidityThenCloseOptions(add.notice: Pulls UNI-V2 liquidity shares with shortOption<>underlying token, and optionTokens from _msgSender().         Then closes the longOptionTokens and withdraws underlyingTokens to the "getCaller()" address.         Sends underlyingTokens from the burned UNI-V2 liquidity shares to the "getCaller()" address.         UNI-V2 -> optionToken -> underlyingToken.

removeShortLiquidityThenCloseOptionsWith.notice: Pulls LP tokens, burns them, removes liquidity, pull option token, burns then, pushes all underlying tokens.
